name: Towers: Land Crash
description:
Towers: Land Crash

Towers is pixel art tower defense game, where you must build towers to protect yourself from fearless orcs, evil wizards and twisted knights.

Game includes 20 levels.

This was just small project in Unity for me. I wanted to make something simple and I'm kinda happy, how the game looks like in the end.

Hope you have fun playing it. :)

If you want use art from this game to your projects, you can find it here: https://davidjakubec.itch.io/64-x-64-sprite-sheet

Feel free to use it. :)
